Topic.Title: Uploading my story into my web page

Posts.EditableText:
Hi,
I need some support.

I did my story, it works perfectly on my pc, using the downloaded Squiffy software or opening the index.html file through the browser.

The issue I have, is that after uploading the .zip file into my own website, how can I make people open the story directly into their browser, maybe using their smartphones and tablets?

Can someone please help me?

Thank you,

Andrea
